data.name: Wakeful Spring
data.description: A feature-complete open-air hot spring. The minerals and elements present here may not be the equal of Aisa Bathhouse, but hot springs of this kind win in terms of their relaxed, casual atmosphere and the relative lack of regulations.\nJust a half-hour soak in here and all the fatigue you've accumulated from work will dissipate into nothingness, replaced by a reawakened vigor, and if there's time, you can lean against a nearby white stone and have some tea and a chat with your friends.\nOf course, please keep some basic etiquette in mind before entering: enjoying the hot spring with friends is fine, but do not stay too long. If you spend too much time in there with chatty folk like the Queen of the Summer Festival, you might get dizzy.

text.text: Wow, is that an open-air hot spring I see? Amazing~!
There's no better feeling than jumping into a hot spring when you're done with work for the day!
Do you wanna join me? Relaxing in a hot spring, chatting away, ahh, it's one of the greatest feelings!
Nothing beats a warm and cozy hot spring...
Just half an hour in a hot spring is enough to get rid of all the fatigue that accumulates during training and battle.
Do you mind if I take a dip now? Ooh! You wanna join me?
Oh? I didn't expect to find my favorite hot springs here. You wouldn't mind it if I took a soak for a while, would you?
Soaking in the steaming water is a fine way to cleanse and soothe both your mind and body.
Now, if I only had a bottle of sake, that would make it perfect.
Aha, an open-air hot spring! Hmm, judging from the amount of steam, I can reasonably infer that the water is perfect.
When I'm soaking in a hot spring, my inspiration soars like steam rising from the hot water.
I gotta say, this is fantastic. Seems you really know how to live it up.
